name: BATTLEGROUNDS 3D
description:
BATTLEGROUNDS 3D created by ROY

Click image to view LEGIT GAMEZ page

Its  an action packed first person shooter which you can connect and play with your friends via Local Area Network(LAN)...You can connect up to 4 or more devices and have fan.

Polished 3D graphics for the best first person experience. Best sound effects for shooting, reloading and also movement. Smooth 3d animations for the best experience. Fast network connection of over 4 users. Easy game play controlles for mouse and keyboard. Realistic 3D maps for intense and action packed multiplayer battles.

Download now and  enjoy!
